title: IMPLEMENT: Should we pay for a Halborn Audit for the LID LIFTOFF Smart Contracts?
body:
Proposal:
Hire Halborn (smart-contract auditing company) to perform an audit of LIFTOFF's smart contracts once completed.

Rationale:
An audit will increase the confidence of presale participants and companies in using the LIFTOFF service and will facilitate a good response to the marketing of LIFTOFF. Halborn is highly qualified and has provided previous audits for LID making them familiar with our smart contracts and therefore well suited for the task of performing the LIFTOFF audit.  Furthermore, confirming the absence of bugs in this critical piece of technology is very important given it is an automated service that will be handling large amounts of money. 
 
Cost:
Based on quotes from Halborn, the cost will be ~20k USD. Currently, based on LID's income, this will reduce the rollover into next month to ~5k USD (IGNORING any profit from presales before the end of the month). 

Implementation Time: 
Halborn's audit will likely take ~2 weeks to complete once started.
author: 0xB8aA505F812ab1dE4f67DdFD28cbAccae700ce9a
